skills.name: Gravity Suppression
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Edge of the Void
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> <u>base chance</u> to reduce the enemy's SPD by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skills.name: Synthetic Black Hole
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> and SPD reduced by <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>.

skills.name: Time Distortion
skills.desc: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals <u>Additional</u> Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of his ATK to the enemy.

skills.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
skills.desc: After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by <unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak>. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> and SPD reduced by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

eidolons.name: Legacy of Honor
eidolons.desc: After Welt uses his Ultimate, his abilities are enhanced. The next <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> time(s) he uses his Basic ATK or Skill, deals Additional DMG to the target equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Basic ATK's DMG multiplier or <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of his Skill's DMG multiplier respectively.

eidolons.name: Conflux of Stars
eidolons.desc: When his Talent is triggered, Welt regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

eidolons.name: Prayer of Peace
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Appellation of Justice
eidolons.desc: Base chance for Skill to inflict SPD Reduction increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Power of Kindness
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Prospect of Glory
eidolons.desc: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.

skillTree.name: Retribution
skillTree.desc: When using Ultimate, there is a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> base chance to increase the DMG received by the targets by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skillTree.name: Punishment
skillTree.desc: Deals <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break.
